item.description:
Academic Meetup is back!

Yutaka-san will lead the group. Here is the tentative schedule:
・5:00-5:45pm?English time(Self information/Free conversation)
・5:45-6:45pm?Jpanese time(Free coversation/stady etc,)

This is in the Prudential mall at 800 Boylston Street between Copley & Hynes green line T stations.

Walk inside the front entrance to the mall at 800 Boylston Street, go up the escalator, and walk straight. You will see a large food court on the right side after a short walk, please find the group in there.

For directions click here.
item.name: Academic Meetup at Prudential Food Court
